Tools for recording usability tests

Good old Twitter… I asked my friends to recommend screen recording software (specifically for recording usability tests), and I got a list of great looking apps to try. Silverback was the clear favourite, although the latest version appears to be in private beta.

  • Silverback
  • Quicktime
  • Viewport
  • Lookback
  • Validately
  • Open Broadcaster Software
  • Screenflow
  • SnapzProX

Did I miss anything?
